description: This source file defines the MovieRowView class, a custom horizontally-scrollable UI component for displaying a row of movie cards optimized for TV D-pad navigation. It manages focus, item selection, and communicates user interactions via a Listener interface.

classes.name: MovieRowView
classes.description: A custom view representing a horizontally scrollable row of movie cards, designed for TV navigation with focus management and callback interfaces.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Initializes the row with a list of MovieItem objects, creating MovieCardView instances for each item, and setting up focus and click callbacks.

methods.name: focusFirst
methods.description: Sets focus to the first MovieCardView in the container.

methods.name: dispatchKeyEvent
methods.description: Handles key events for D-pad navigation, managing focus movement and scrolling behavior.

methods.name: focusedChildIndex
methods.description: Returns the index of the currently focused child view within the container.

methods.name: ensureViewCentered
methods.description: Scrolls the view smoothly to center the specified child view.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Utility function to convert density-independent pixels to actual pixel values based on device density.
